title: When I launch the client nothing happens since update began?
body: When I click launch it just loads then nothing happens,is this because of the update ? I uninstalled and redownloaded league to get the new client and the same thing happened. What's going on? :(

replies.body:
[Grant League permission to run on your computer!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Annie_3.jpg
Already done,still launches,then nothing happens

It's possible that you need to complete a clean reinstallation of League in order to resolve the issue. Grab Riot's [Hextech Repair Tool](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi) and check both the box for 'Reinstall' and 'Clean Uninstall', then hit the Start button. This will wipe all files associated with League to ensure corruption doesn't carry over, then reinstalls the game.

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/d/d2/Annie_HextechSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160224210722

Let us know if your issue is resolved or not.

> [{quoted}](name=Rineyy,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BJXKh8Jr,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-04-24T22:59:25.725+0000)
>
> It&#x27;s possible that you need to complete a clean reinstallation of League in order to resolve the issue. Grab Riot's [Hextech Repair Tool](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi) and check both the box for &#x27;Reinstall&#x27; and &#x27;Clean Uninstall&#x27;, then hit the Start button. This will wipe all files associated with League to ensure corruption doesn&#x27;t carry over, then reinstalls the game.
> 
> http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/d/d2/Annie_HextechSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160224210722
> 
> Let us know if your issue is resolved or not.

Did not work,clicked re-install and clean uninstall and it did not un install it or re-install it,yes I am on the administrative user.
Close the Tool, restart your computer and attempt again.
My immediate thought was the same,tried again,didn't work. My legacy client worked all the way up until now never had an option to even try the new client,just this...
Where do I even get the new client? when i re installed manually it gave me the same old client,this is incredibly ridiculous. and so many others are experiencing the same issue

The Legacy Client is still needed to install the game but is disabled afterwards when the game is up to date and ready to launch. 

After the game is up to date, clicking "Launch" will update the / install the Beta Client.
That's the whole problem,I thought we were doing away with the legacy client completely? Fix this,it's not our CPU's causing the problem..

Completely in terms of gameplay, yes. Perhaps we could have been more specific in stating the Legacy is still needed to install the game.

Drop a line with Riot’s [Technical Support Centre.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=34190)

* The primary category has already been chosen. 

* For the secondary category, select **I’m having issues on the PvP.Net Client.**

Include the logs generated by the Hextech Repair Tool and explain your issue clearly without venting. We understand your frustration but venting on us isn't going to assist you sooner or better.

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/267154390849290244/305927285339586560/HRT_-_Chat_HRT_101.png

https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-HCCc9VGLMBs/VvGim_HT2MI/AAAAAAAA5EU/CQi6aIgFrm0rtxw5hZl4Al3mMP3k3JAyg/s1600/Lissandra_Splash_3.jpg

I'll just go back to playing runescape until you guys make a platform that actually works out, instead of making us download more things to fix a problem that clearly has nothing to do with our systems,which also doesn't work. Thanks Riot. Dueces

Well it does work actually, for over 90% of League's playerbase worldwide, just not for you for and a small number of other players. We're reaching out to you and it is a frustrating process but we would have been able to get it working for you in the end.
I haven't seen one player on this forum with the same problem as me have their issue resolved.
No problem!

Went into the client via right click and deleted the old launcher,now its stuck repairing at 33% should figure out that it needs the new launcher so my brother says,so far he's been more help. I'll resolve the problem myself with less stress.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/4YAFyi4P-is-your-updated-client-not-working-youve-come-to-the-right-place?comment=001c

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/4YAFyi4P-is-your-updated-client-not-working-youve-come-to-the-right-place?comment=0001000000010001

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/4YAFyi4P-is-your-updated-client-not-working-youve-come-to-the-right-place?comment=000700000000

3 examples of issues similar to yours, if not the same.

I left a comment on another page but long story short go to C drive (located in my documents, my computer), locate riot games folder, then into League of Legends folder, locate the file "LeagueClient" and if there's a messed up symbol or says error when you try to double left click on that DELETE IT. Then, a few files down is "lol.launcher" click that and it should run to the client, hit the LAUNCH button then it will do it's update. GOODLUCK!
i followed the permissions guide as an administrator and am still having the exact same problem as before. I click launch and it takes me to a blank black rectangle on my screen.

It sounds like your OS doesn't have the right permissions setup to allow League to launch. You mentioned you already had permissions set up, but the updated client will need some additional changes. Go through the steps in our [**permission guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to double check that you have all the right settings in place, but hit us back if that doesn't work.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BJXKh8Jr,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-04-24T23:36:04.680+0000)
>
> It sounds like your OS doesn't have the right permissions setup to allow League to launch. You mentioned you already had permissions set up, but the updated client will need some additional changes. Go through the steps in our [**permission guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to double check that you have all the right settings in place, but hit us back if that doesn't work.

No,there's no permission problem just stop,make a downloadable NEW CLIENT
I've been through the permission guide time after time already.

That guide is used sometimes as a first step so that we can figure out what the real issue is since we don't have your pc in front of us to go through all of our troubleshooting at once. Thanks for giving it a try though!

Since that didn't help, we probably need to take a much closer look at what's going on in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Our tech guys can dig much deeper into your pc's settings than I can here on the boards.

HeyGuys im having the same problem, just a black screen after i press launch. i reinstalled the game. restarted. i pinned the new client to my desktop and just get wierd error messages when i click on the new client icon. im running windows 8 if that helps.

Black screens usually stem from failed connection attempts to the servers.

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/su16_keyart_1920x1080_0.jpg?itok=6nj8mHjj
same, why the hell when i download it manually from the website, you recieve the old client on the website ??? rito pls.

The Legacy Client is still needed to install the game but is disabled afterwards when the game is up to date and ready to launch. 

After the game is up to date, clicking "Launch" will update the / install the Beta Client.

> [{quoted}](name=Spencepai,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BJXKh8Jr,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-04-24T23:35:11.237+0000)
